lines.text: I have two kids. A boy and... a boy, too. Two boys.
Well, how's the cat?
Better, she said.
Just so she said, didn't she?
Yes, she did.
Such a wonderful cat! The best cat in the world, isn't she?
It's just that... it compromises you.
I have had such a spotless reputation, it's about time I were compromised.
Don't hit me on the head! It's my sensitive spot!
It's your empty spot!
What are you doing?
Uhm, I'm considering these boots, Ljudmila Prokofjevna. Do you like them?
They are very slutty, I would not buy them. And in your place, I would concentrate on my job, and shop for boots after work.
[Exits. ]
Meaning, good boots, I should take them.
You didn't do too well in grade school, did you?
Let's leave my shady past alone.
I've realized why we keep fighting. We need a baby.

[on the phone at work]
You want a baby?
Yes, and as soon as possible.
I... I can't right now.
Why did you have to eat modeling clay?
But I ate it with sugar.

[collecting money for a birthday present]
50 copecks!
Again?
When you're fifty, we'll collect for you too!
I won't live that long. I have an unhealthy job.

[collecting money]
50 copecks! 50 copecks! Masha V. had a baby!
If someone else at this job dies or has a baby, I'll be left without lunch.
